overview: From 2025-01-10 to 2025-01-11, elizaos/eliza had 42 new PRs (21 merged), 12 new issues, and 75 active contributors.

completedItems.title: Docs improvements
completedItems.body:
Hello!
During reading the docs, my OCD observed some minor typos that I fixed.
Hope it help
Br,
Tudor

completedItems.title: fix: prevent repeated login by reusing client-twitter session
completedItems.body:
This PR is based on https://github.com/elizaOS/eliza/pull/1974 made by @mrsalitre (https://github.com/mrsalitre)
I’ve remade this PR because maintainer edit access was not enabled, making it difficult to make necessary changes directly.
